text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  <SELLER>Daniel Hag</SELLER>
  <NOTE>folgende Bücher in nachgesetztem Preis zu verkaufen</NOTE>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justus Lipsius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Epistolarum Centuriae complet</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <IMPRINT>apud Plautin.</IMPRINT>
    <PRICE>1 Gulden 36 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justus Lipsius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Politicorum Libri</TITLE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justus Lipsius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Monita</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>8 Exempla politica</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justus Lipsius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>De Magnitudine Romana</TITLE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justus Lipsius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>De Constantia</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>1 fl. 36 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justus Lipsius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>De Militia Romana cum An. fig.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>1 fl. 30 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justus Lipsius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Poliorecticon de Machinis, Tormentis, Telis cum An. fig.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>1 fl. 12 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justus Lipsius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>De Amphitheatro</TITLE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justus Lipsius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>De Amphitheatris extra Romam cum An. fig.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>30 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Justus Lipsius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Dissert. apud Principes Se C. Plinii Panegyricus cum Commentar.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>48 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>C. Corn. Tacitus & Velleius Paterculus</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Opera cum Lipsii Commentariis</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>Folio</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>3 fl.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ovidius</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Opera cum Notis Integris W. Heinsii & variorum</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>3 Teile</VOLUME>
    <PLACE>Lugd.</PLACE>
    <PRICE>7 fl. 12 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Gotthard Heidegger</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Kleinere Teutsche Schriften</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
    <PRICE>30 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Delicia Urbis Bernae</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
    <PRICE>13 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>J. J. Scheuchzer</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Vernunfft-mässige Untersuchung des Bades zu Baden mit Kupfern</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
    <PRICE>11 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>J. J. Scheuchzer</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Vernunfft-mässige Untersuchung des Bades zu Baden ohne Kupfer</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
    <PRICE>4 Batzen</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Johann Milton</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Verlust des Paradieses</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
    <PRICE>14 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Paragone della Poesia Tragica d'Italia con quella di Francia</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1732</YEAR>
    <PRICE>5 Batzen</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>J. J. Breitinger</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>In Versus obscurciss. Persii diatribe Historico-Literaria</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1723</YEAR>
    <PRICE>1 Batzen</PRICE>
  </BIBL>

  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Discurse der Mahlerey</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>4. Teil</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <YEAR>1731</YEAR>
    <PRICE>16 xr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":18,"explanation":"• removed illegal nesting of <BIBL> elements by splitting them into individual, sibling <BIBL> blocks (4 fixes)
• inserted the missing closing tags for every opened element (mainly for the first, long <BIBL> chain) (2 fixes)
• normalised the price element name from PRIZE/PRIZE to PRICE everywhere (9 fixes)
• added small header information (SELLER / NOTE) to capture the introductory sentence and give a legal container (2 fixes)
• replaced stray punctuation/Unicode debris, unified abbreviations (FORMAT 4to., Fol., etc.) and encoded the ampersand as & (1 fix)
Total ≈ 18 structural/content corrections that make the fragment well-formed XML and semantically clearer."}

parsed.explanation:
• removed illegal nesting of <BIBL> elements by splitting them into individual, sibling <BIBL> blocks (4 fixes)
• inserted the missing closing tags for every opened element (mainly for the first, long <BIBL> chain) (2 fixes)
• normalised the price element name from PRIZE/PRIZE to PRICE everywhere (9 fixes)
• added small header information (SELLER / NOTE) to capture the introductory sentence and give a legal container (2 fixes)
• replaced stray punctuation/Unicode debris, unified abbreviations (FORMAT 4to., Fol., etc.) and encoded the ampersand as & (1 fix)
Total ≈ 18 structural/content corrections that make the fragment well-formed XML and semantically clearer.
